answer:
The total annual budget for Brighton & Hove City Council for the financial year 2023 to 2024 is **over £891 million**.

- This budget covers the cost of delivering various services across the city, including education, social care, housing, and infrastructure maintenance.
- The council spends approximately **£2.44 million per day** to run these services efficiently.

For more detailed information about the budget and how it is allocated, you can visit the Brighton & Hove City Council's budget page at [www.brighton-hove.gov.uk/bhbudget](https://www.brighton-hove.gov.uk/bhbudget).
